verses.roman:
śuni' brahmacārī kahe,--'karaha santoṣe
āmi ta' āniba tāṅre tṛtīya divase'

synonyms: śuni'-hearing; brahmacārī—Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī; kahe—said; karaha santoṣe—become happy; āmi—I; ta'-certainly; āniba—shall bring; tāṅre—Him (Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu); tṛtīya divase—on the third day.
translation: Hearing this, Nṛsiṁhānanda Brahmacārī replied, "Please be satisfied. I assure you that I shall bring Him here three days from now."
